summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4414 for the improvement of 34th Avenue Northwest, from West 68th Street to West 77th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52152, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
